Interface ITextBuilder

public interface ITextBuilder

Matheus Mota

Method Detail

foundDocumentBegin

void foundDocumentBegin(TextDocumentProperties properties)
This method is called when: Director found the begin of a text document.

Parameters:
textFileProperties - Properties of the text file, like full path, size, number of letters, number of images, number of styles, mime-type etc.

foundParagraphBegin

void foundParagraphBegin(Paragraph paragraph)
This method is called when: Director found the beginning of a paragraph

Parameters:
paragraph - Represents the paragraph it-self, having the text content and some properties, such as style orientation etc.

foundCharSequenceBegin

void foundCharSequenceBegin(CharSequence charSequence)
This method is called when: Director found a char sequence into a paragraph. CharSequences are usually called when the actual properties of a charSequence is modified

Parameters:
charSequence - holds the content and properties of a charSequence

foundObject

void foundObject(TextObject textObject)
This method is called when: Director found a image into the char sequence into a paragraph

Parameters:
textObject - holds the properties of the founded object and it self. For example, if its a image, the object type will be IMAGE and the method getAsImage(); will return the image itself.

foundCharSequenceEnd

void foundCharSequenceEnd(CharSequence charSequence)
This method is called when: Director found the end of a char sequence into a paragraph. For instance, if you are creating aXML, this is a good time to end your tag (). CharSequences are usually called when the actual properties of a charSequence is modified

Parameters:
charSequence - holds the content and properties of a charSequence

foundParagraphEnd

void foundParagraphEnd(Paragraph paragraph)
This method is called when: Director found the end of a paragraph

Parameters:
paragraph - Represents the paragraph it-self, having the text content and some properties, such as style orientation etc.

foundTextDocumentEnd

void foundTextDocumentEnd(TextDocumentProperties textFileProperties)
This method is called when: Director found the end of a text document.

Parameters:
textFileProperties - Properties of the text file, like full path, size, number of letters, number of images, number of styles, mime-type etc.
